title: The way forward is to view Manchin and Sinema as opportunities not just as obstacles

sentence: Let's show them we're NOT backing down: https://t.co/4OXYM6kWP5 pic.twitter.com/o6xQ538lJz Mandela Barnes (@TheOtherMandela) December 20, 2021
title: The way forward is to view Manchin and Sinema as opportunities not just as obstacles

sentence: As I have written, the leading Democratic Senate contender, Mandela Barnes, initially went far to the left (e.g., favoring Medicare-for-all, abolishing ICE), although he recently has tried to tack back to the center.
title: Opinion The Wisconsin GOP is stuck with Ron Johnson. Democrats could pick a winner.
